articles.description: Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma and other cricketers and WAGs in Royal Challengers Bangalore camp were spotted chilling at the RCB Cafe Bar in Bengaluru ahead of their away matches leg that begins on May 1 in Lucknow.

articles.author: Asian News International
articles.title: Sri Lanka Spinner Prabath Jayasuriya Breaks 71-Year-Old Test Record - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Jayasuriya hit the 50-wicket mark in his seventh Test to take away the record from West Indies' Alf Valentine as the spinner to reach the 50-wicket milestone in the fewest number of matches.
articles.content: Sri Lanka spinner Prabath Jayasuriya broke a 71-year-old record when he dismissed Ireland's Paul Stirling to claim his 50th Test wicket on the final day of the second Test in Galle on Friday. Jayasur… [+1832 chars]

articles.title: “I never saw so much sadness” - Lionel Messi’s ex-teammate reveals PSG superstar’s worst moment with Argentina - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Former Argentina international Marcos Rojo has said that Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) superstar Lionel Messi was devastated following La Albiceleste’s Copa America Centenario defeat in 2016.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tendulkar reveals inspirational speech to teammates ahead of Pakistan clash at 2011 World Cup - ICC Cricket
articles.description: India great Sachin Tendulkar has revealed the inspirational message he passed on to teammates ahead of their cut-throat semi-final clash against Pakistan at the 2011 ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup.
